meta.name: Test Game
meta.description: This is a game that isn't actually a game but just a test for the compiler thing üòÉ. Also, this description won't get written to disc üôÅ
meta.author: Arthur Beck
meta._comment1: All keys that the compiler doesn't recognize, it ignores. Including this.

overrides.request_to_pause: Please pause and make your decision now.

meta._comment2: All values in the 'overrides' object are the defaults, but they don't have to be(obviously). request_to_pause is only used in version 1.2.
meta._comment3: Version 1.1 and 1.2 are identical but 1.2 asks the user to pause after listing the options and gives only five seconds of delay after the speech

start.speech: This is literally just a test. Nothing more, nothing less.
start.title: Listen! It's a test!

start2.speech: This is literally just a test. Nothing more, nothing less.
start2.title: Listen! It's a test!
